entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as being gravely serious.

entities.name: cole
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is talking to Dumbledore about a student named Tom.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is observing the conversation between Dumbledore and Mrs. Cole.

entities.name: billy stubbs
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who has a rabbit that was possibly bullied by Tom.

relationships.description: Mrs. Cole is talking to Dumbledore about a student named Tom.
Harry is observing the conversation between Mrs. Cole and Dumbledore.
